rows.label: tlk70000034_02_msg0001
rows.name:
My friend Azzaro and I first met
in Invidia. Our meeting was fate,
predestined in the stars!

rows.label: tlk70000034_02_msg0002
rows.name:
It was meeting him that convinced
me that a music-loving heart is
down to nature, not nurture.

rows.label: tlk70000034_02_msg0003
rows.name:
We hit it off immediately. Together
we have traveled through Invidia,
Superbia, Gula, and now Iira!

rows.label: tlk70000034_02_msg0004
rows.name:
We'd heard there was lots of money to
be made here...and, er, that it was
just a really lovely place to visit!
